Text: The Skulls were a Los Angeles punk band formed in 1976.

1:
--------------------
Text: The Skulls (American band):  After a short lifespan, vocalist Steven William "Billy Bones" Fortuna reformed the band from time to time with various differing members, however The Skulls were re-established full-time with James 'Hardslug' Harding in 2000 until 2006.

Text: The Skulls (American band):  In recent years the band plays a casual show here and there with the '2000-2003' lineup of Billy Bones, James Harding, Sean Antillon and Kevin Preston - full history below.
